playerViewErrorDetails: If the error still appears, ask the storyteller to create a new game.
playerViewDetails: Open your camera and scan the QR code that the narrator will show you.
name: Name
character_werewolf_description: During the night, you vote someone to be killed with the other werewolves in secret.
character_nudist_description: Everyone knows that you are the nudist.
character_seer_description: You can know the role of a player every night.
character_suicide_description: If you get killed in the first voting session, you win. Otherwise, you become a regular villager.
character_feral-kid_description: The first night, you choose your adoptive parent. You start as a villager, but when your parent dies, you become a werewolf.
character_baker_description: Every night, you wake someone up and reveal your role in secret.
character_triplet_description: You know who your siblings are.
character_twin_description: You know who your siblings are.
character_witch_description:
Can save 1 person that got killed during the night before it finishes, also can kill 1 person at the end of the night.
1 usage of each.
character_doctor_description:
Can save 1 person that got killed during the night before it finishes. 
1 usage.
ability_extra-life_description:
When your death is announced, you can use the extra life and not die. 
1 usage.
ability_extra-vote_description:
In one voting session, you can emit another vote. 
1 usage.
ability_cupid_description: The first night, you have to choose two players to fall in love. If one lover dies, the other also dies.
ability_major_description: In case of a tie during the day, your vote defines the result. When a major dies, he chooses the next major, this way there's always a major.
